TopicTitle: how about a few construction tutorials

Articles.Content:
im fairly new to this so please bear with me..

how about if the more experienced put up a few construction tutorials explaining how things work and what is needed on for example a munar rover? or a munar space craft? it would save a lot of heartache, and cursing.. a lot of cursing...unless this game has that in mind..lol..

if they have them i just havent found 'em and would appreciate some help finding them..thanks
Well usually first time tutorials give a good ovelook of the VAB building process.
Did u check the tutorials on the wiki?

boy, those "tutorials" really bit the green green weenie..

looks like they were made by a kid with a crayon
There's a few basic ones in my signature, it's strictly rocket construction methods right now, but its a start

Check YouTube, there are hundreds, if not thousands, of videos on KSP including tutorials. Look up ones by Scott Manley, some of the best ones out there.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

You're right in that the early tutorials leave some to be desired; they go mainly after the basics of what you need to know to play the game. You might try the historical missions section of the wiki tutorials - they've got actual instructions on building craft and what they're intended to do. Leave the station tutorials alone. Other than that, building's not much more than "put the big green balls together and hope the damn thing doesn't fall apart as soon as the computer releases it to be launched".

Might also try The Drawing Board; that may be more along the lines of what you're looking for.

its good thing we have plenty of kerbals....

everyone wants to be an kerbalnaut!!!!
